data.title: Birth, Death, Marriage and Divorce Records
data.meta_description: Birth, Death, Marriage and Divorce Records
data.text:
Order by Mail

Order A Record by Mail Via US Postal Service by downloading and completing the application from this website. Mail the completed application, a photocopy of your valid ID (if applicable), and the fee to the PO Box address listed on the application. Vital records fees are $34. Optional RUSH fees and processing times are listed on each application.**

Order Online

Order A Record Online from www.VitalChek.com. Fees are $34.00 for the search, $14.00 for the VitalChek processing fee, and $12.00 optional rush fee (This is a two-week processing time). There is an optional overnight delivery fee of $19.75, and you should receive the record in 1-3 business days. Exemplified records are $42.00 plus $14.00 VitalChek processing and optional $25 rush fee. Applying the apostille at the Office of the Great Seal for any request takes an additional 1-2 weeks.**

Order by Phone

Order A Record by Phone using VitalChek at 866-443-9897. Same processing and fees apply.

Order in Person

In-person ordering is available by appointment only. Dates and Times are limited to Tuesdays and Thursdays, 10:00am - 2:00pm. Schedule an appointment. Services are limited; Changes are drop-off only and Genealogy request may not be completed same day.

Order by Using the Drop Box

Drop off your completed application along with the proper fee and any necessary ID and/or documentation. All required documents and fees must be in a sealed envelope. Drop Box is located in the main lobby of 333 S. Grand Ave., Lansing, MI 48933 and available Monday-Friday, 7:00am - 5:30pm.

Will Call

Will-Call pick-up is available by using VitalChek. Order online and pick-up your Vital Record within 2-5 business days. Will-Call Dates and Times are limited to Tuesdays and Thursdays, 10:00am - 2:00pm. Applicant who ordered must pick-up and have valid ID and e-mail confirmation upon arrival. Click here for Will-Call.

Correct a Vital Record

Requests to correct or change Michigan birth and death certificates must be sent through the mail with the appropriate applications and proof. Select a link below for more information.

Correct a Birth Record

Correct a Death Record

Please contact our office at 517-335-8666 or VRCustomerService@michigan.gov if you have questions or concerns pertaining to vital records.

-Effective May 13th, 2024: Customer Service phone lines will be available from 10:00am-12:30pm & 1:00pm-3:30pm EST.

The State Vital Records Office is closed on recognized state holidays.

**Processing and mail times may be delayed. Applying for a Michigan Vital Record does not guarantee that a record will be found. All search fees are non-refundable.
